title: A Day Of Retirements
description:
In a big day of retirements, Field and the NFL Live Crew discuss Frank Gore’s 1-day contract to retire with the 49ers, Brady and Rodgers’ play at “The Match”, Rodger’s comments on his future, Tim Patrick’s “Super Bowl or Bust” comments, and Ryan Fitzpatrick announces his retirement. 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN
itunes:subtitle: NFL Live: Frank Gore and Ryan Fitzpatrick announce their retirements and fallout from "The Match".
